name: names-bs
description: displays a wordcloud for first names from Basel/Switzerland and allows the comparison of frequency over time for selected names to other names.

name: delphi-bs
description: Prototype for a information system adapted for handheld devices. Gives access to various datasets published by data.bs and the Office for Statistics of Basel/Switzerland.

name: foph-covid19-data-explorer
description: This app allows to explore the datasets used in the Federal Office of Public Health's (FOPH) dashboard.

name: lqx-bs
description: LQX-bs allows to explore air quality data from the station St. Johannplatz in Basel. data may be presented as statistics and in various plot-types. There is also an option to demonstrate the impact of fireworks.

name: speed-ex-bs
description: Statistische und graphische Auswertung der Geschwindigkeits√ºbertretungen im Kanton Basel-Stadt seit 2018.
